examples: no comparison between the two books

definitions.text: examine and note the similarities or differences of
examples: John compared his haircut to his friend's
We compared notes after we had both seen the movie
This car does not compare with our line of Mercedes

definitions.text: consider or describe as similar, equal, or analogous
examples: We can compare the Han dynasty to the Romans
You cannot equate success in financial matters with greed

definitions.text: to form the comparative or superlative form on an adjective or adverb
